attributes.additional_details: Well I would hope that the government and parliament and Borris Johnson does something about it
attributes.background: I would like people to stop panic buying because it’s effecting young people who live on there own like my self because after work I wanna do food shopping and can’t even go to Morrison’s,Tesco,Sainsbury’s because people are so selfish and have to take it all straight away in the morning

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300766

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
